00051 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00052 
00053 void CalculatorFactory::RegisterAll(void)
00054 {
00055         Calculators().Register<Izindo>("izindo"); // ZINDO-based transfer integrals
00056         Calculators().Register<Ihistogram>("ihistogram"); // histogram of transfer integrals
00057 
00058         Calculators().Register<Ecoulomb>("ecoulomb"); // Coulomb part of site energies
00059         Calculators().Register<Eoutersphere>("eoutersphere"); // Outersphere reorganization energy
00060         Calculators().Register<Egaussian>("egaussian"); // gaussian (also correlated) distribution of site energies
00061         Calculators().Register<Ecorrelation>("ecorrelation"); // site energy correlation function
00062         Calculators().Register<Ehistogram>("ehistogram"); // site energy histogram
00063         Calculators().Register<Etinker>("etinker"); // input for the TINKER package (site energies)
00064         
00065         Calculators().Register<Neighborlist>("neighborlist"); // fragment-based neighbor list
00066         Calculators().Register<Oboltzmann>("oboltzmann"); // Boltzmann distribution of site energies
00067 
00068         Calculators().Register<PairDump>("pairdump"); // Dumps pair coordinates for DFT coupling elements
00069         Calculators().Register<Vaverage>("vaverage"); // average charge velocities (via site occupations)
00070         //Calculators().Register<SQLiteWriter>("sqlitewriter");
00071 
00072         Calculators().Register<Tdump>("tdump"); // coarse-grained and based on rigid segments trajectories
00073         Calculators().Register<Rates>("rates"); // Marcus, Jortner rates
00074         
00075         //Calculators().Register<WriteXML>("writexml");  // obsolete
00076  
00077         #ifdef WITH_VOTCA_KMCOLD        
00078         Calculators().Register<ContKmc>("kmc");
00079         #endif
00080 
00081 }
00082 
00083 }}
